mapper.select: select count(group_reply_id) from tbl_group_reply where member_id = #{memberId}

select gr.member_id, g.group_id, group_name, group_max_value, group_category, group_title, group_content, group_location, group_register_date, group_end_date, group_meet_date, group_file_original_name, group_file_uuid, group_file_path, group_file_size, group_file_type, group_captain, group_reply_id, group_reply_content, group_reply_register_date, group_reply_update_date from tbl_member m join tbl_group_reply gr on m.member_id = gr.member_id join tbl_group g on gr.group_id = g.group_id where m.member_id = #{memberId}
